text: sulgwa dobag-e gwanhayeo geudaeege mul-eulttae illeogalodoe geu du gos eneun keun joeaggwa ingan-e yuyonghan geos-i iss-euna geugeos-ui joeag-eun hyoyongbo da keuda ileudoe tto geudeul-i mueos-eulo jaseon-eul bepul-eoya doeneunyago mul eulttae illeogalodoe geugeos-eun yeobun-ilailleola geulihayeo hananim-eun neohuiege gyemyeong-eul jusin hu neohoelo hayeogeumsuggohadolog hayeossnola
